alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:32PM CDT until April 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR EASTERN HOWARD...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...WINNESHIEK AND CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 1131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harmony to near Fredericksburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decorah, Cresco, New Hampton, West Union, Calmar, Fredericksburg, Ossian, Hawkeye, Lawler, Spillville, Fort Atkinson, Ridgeway, Protivin, Waucoma, Jerico, St. Lucas, Jackson Junction, Vernon Springs County Park, Festina and Vernon Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Iowa...and southeastern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
